HelpXML.Title: subsets
HelpXML.Purpose: subsets creates a matrix of indexes where rows are distinct p-subsets extracted from a set of n elements

Item.Name: nsamp
Item.ShortDesc: Number of subsamples which have to be extracted

Item.Name: n
Item.ShortDesc: Number of observations of the dataset

Item.Name: p
Item.LongDesc: In regression with p explanatory variable the size of the elmental subsets is p; in multivariate analysis, in presence of v variables, the size of the elemental subsets is v+1.

Item.Name: ncomb
Item.TypeInd: If the user has already computed this value it can supply it directly, otherwise the program will calculate it automatically

Item.Name: msg
Item.ShortDesc: scalar which controls whether to display or not messages on the screen
Item.TypeInd: If msg=1 (default), messages are displayed on the screen about estimated time

Item.Name: C
Item.ShortDesc: Matrix with nselected rows and p columns (stored in int16 format)
Item.TypeInd: The indeces of the subsets which need to be extracted.

Item.Name: nselected
Item.TypeInd: Number of rows of matrix C.
